English: Soviet troops retreat
Southern Kolguyev
The tank colum has left their territory heading north up the road. We have just enough time to intercept them.
Alright, we get to it. Stas, try to get as many people and equipment out of here as fast as possible.\nWe can give you fifteen minutes at best.
Good luck, comrades!
Get in!
Got the mines, Rashiv?
Yes, comrade.
We put them on the road. Try to be smart about it, we do not have many of them. We need to hit as many tanks as possible.
We hide in the bush and wait for them to come. There's a crate with AT so arm yourself, Rashiv.\nIt will be up to you to destroy the remaining tanks.
They must not discover us or the plan's a bust! Let's go, men.
WE'LL HIDE IN THOSE BUSHES AND WAIT FOR THEM. DO NOT SHOW YOURSELVES!
RASHIV, DO NOT FORGET TO TAKE THE AT FROM THAT CRATE.
THEY'RE GETTING CLOSE, GET READY MEN!
FIRE AT WILL! GO, GO, GO!
GOOD JOB, MEN. WE'VE DONE WELL. THIS BOUGHT US VALUABLE TIME. LET'S GO BACK, WE CANNOT REPEL A SECOND WAVE.
WHAT ARE YOU DOING, RASHIV! NOW THEY KNOW WE'RE HERE! THEY'LL PROBABLY GO AROUND! FOR FUCK'S SAKE!
THEY'RE GETTING THROUGH! STOP THEM!
THEY GOT THROUGH! THE BASE IS DOOMED. SHIT, RETREAT!
Tank Column
Base
Ambush
AT
PREPARE AN AMBUSH
